summary: Despite the $10 per barrel decline in oil prices, TotalEnergies expects its earnings and cash flow to have increased in the third quarter from a year earlier, on the back of higher oil and gas production and an annual surge in refining margins. title: China Drives Global EV Sales to Record High
summary: Global sales of electric vehicles rose to a record high of 2.1 million in September, driven by Chinese demand which accounted for over half of that global total, Rho Motion reported today. title: More Supertankers Divert After U.S. Sanctions Hit Chinese Oil Port
summary: Three very large crude carriers have diverted from their original destination of the port of Rizhao in China, following the U.S. Treasury’s announcement of sanctions on the facility due to its handling of Iranian crude, Bloomberg has reported, citing shipping data. title: Chevron Wants to Weigh In on the Launch of Venture Global’s New LNG Plant
summary: Chevron has requested to submit an opinion about a possible delay in the start-up of Venture Global’s second LNG plant, as the supermajor worries any delay would interfere with its delivery plans under a long-term contract with Venture Global. summary: Sales of electric vehicles in the United States hit an all-time high in the third quarter.
